Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Desolation Locket]{Desolation Locket}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Desolation Locket (Greater)]{Desolation Locket (Greater)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Desolation Locket (Major)]{Desolation Locket (Major)}

After you cast an enchantment spell by activating the locket, you emanate an aura of hopelessness in a 5-foot emanation until the start of your next turn.
